title: wtf are you kidding me?
body: Are you kidding me? Why don't you change your password?  The system is entirely compromised until you correct it.  You're the sysadmin, if you're this dumb the corporation is at risk.

title: THE CAUSE OF ALL THAT IS SENSIBLE IS NOT ANYTHING SENSIBLE
body: We say this of the cause of all being beyond all: Vg vf abg orvat-yrff, abg yvsryrff, abg jvgubhg ernfba, abg jvgubhg vagryyrpg, abg obql, abg svther, abg sbez, abg jung unf dhnyvgl, dhnagvgl, be znff, abg va fcnpr, abg ivfvoyr, abg jung unf frafvoyr pbagnpg, abg jung unf frafngvba be jung vg frafrq, abg jung unf qvfbeqre naq pbashfvba, abg jung vf gebhoyrq ol zngrevny cnffvbaf, abg cbjreyrff, abg fhowrpgrq gb jung unccraf gb frafvoyrf, abg yvtug va jung ynpxf, abg, naq unf abg, nygrengvba, qrfgehpgvba, cevingvba, qvzvahgvba, be nalguvat ryfr juvpu cregnvaf gb jung vf frafrq.

title: Not for Disclosure to the Uninitiated
body: NOTE: do not disclose to those who are entangled in beings, imagine nothing beyond beings, and claim to know by the knowledge in them Him who has made the dark his hiding place... If you desire to ascend to the divine mystical initiations are beyond these, decrypt my next message...
